Address the User

Address the user as you wherever possible. Content on government sites often makes a direct appeal to citizens and businesses to get involved or take action. For example, You can contact 18F at this email address or Learn more about starting your MyRA account.

If you’re creating content that addresses multiple users — for example, a patient and their caregiver — address the nominal user as “you” and refer to the additional users by their roles or titles.
